publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6478 Jim Mather: The Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts (Scotland) Order 2010—That the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee recommends that the Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts (Scotland) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
